Question: This person's last full-time day at Microsoft was June 27, 2008.
Hints: It ended in 1991, when this person led Microsoft to develop a version of OS/2 independently from IBM.
This person has one elder sister, Kristi (Kristianne), and one younger sister, Libby.
This person later said he had simply resisted attempts by Boies to mischaracterize his words and actions.
